# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
{DummyDevice} is a plugin for spreads (http://github.com/DIYBookScanner/spreads)

#
# Automatically generated by createplugin!
#
Write your code in:
    spreadsplug_dummydevice/DummyDevicePlugin.py 
    
If you add or rename any files, import any external dependencies, etc. 
you'll need to update
    setup.cfg

You should also edit `setup.cfg' and give author information, license,
etc.

To install:
$ cd ..
$ sudo pip install dummydevice/

To remove:
$ sudo pip uninstall spreadsplug_dummydevice
#
# Have fun!
#
